title: How to Make Reusable Cloth Bags

steps.headline: Sew the lining fabric and outer fabric
Cut out outside fabric and lining fabric both in the size of 28 centimeter (11.0 in) by 80 centimeter (31.5 in); leave 1 centimeter (0.4 in) for seam allowance at each side.
steps.description: Cut two strips for bag handle in accordance with your height.

steps.headline: Cut out cotton lining with the same size of fabric.
steps.description: It is used for flatting the surface of bag.

steps.headline: Lay the lining fabric and cotton fabric together; fold the two pieces in half; make the lining fabric faced with right side; sew along the edges.
Similarly fold the outside fabric in half with right side faced; sew along the edges.

methods.name: Making the Body of the Bag

steps.headline: Turn the lining fabric and outside fabric inside out; put the lining fabric into the outside fabric.
Add cotton fabric to the strip; sew the two strips into tubular shapes; apparent stitches at both sides of the strip on its right side.
Put the handle between the outside fabric and lining fabric at each side.

methods.name: Making a Decoration for the Bag

steps.headline: Trace a dog on a piece of red fabric; cut out the pattern.
steps.description: Make a stuffed dog with quilting inside.

steps.headline: Make a bow and sew it near dog's neck.
steps.description: Add a brooch at one side of dog; pin it onto the bag.

Making the Body of the Bag Turn the lining fabric and outside fabric inside out; put the lining fabric into the outside fabric.  Add cotton fabric to the strip; sew the two strips into tubular shapes; apparent stitches at both sides of the strip on its right side.  Put the handle between the outside fabric and lining fabric at each side.  Sew along the upper edges. A bag is basically formed. Add a brooch at one side of dog; pin it onto the bag.
